body_html:
Are you asking about building from source using Visual Studio 2017, or doing something else? If you are just starting to learn, I'd recommend using one of the recipes on the installation page, using PIP to install a pre-built binary.

Unfortunately we have limited resources dedicated to maintaining the Windows build, and cannot test it in every possible configuration. However, we gladly accept contributions that improve the documentation or the installation process.

body:
Are you asking about building from source using Visual Studio 2017, or doing something else? If you are just starting to learn, I'd recommend using one of the recipes on the [installation page](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows), using PIP to install a pre-built binary.

Unfortunately we have limited resources dedicated to maintaining the Windows build, and cannot test it in every possible configuration. However, we gladly accept contributions that improve the documentation or the installation process.
